text.section: A municipal corporation may impose by ordinance a user fee on charges for the docking and storage of boats.

section.section: Subject to the limitation in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a municipal corporation shall set the rate of the user fee.
The rate of the user fee may not exceed 5% of the rental charges for the docking and storage of boats.

text.section: The total amount of user fees charged per boat slip may not exceed $100 annually.
